Website Pricing Calculator

Have you ever asked yourself how much a website should cost? Well here I've compiled a few questions to help you gauge how much a website should cost based on research.

What is this?

This is a website pricing calculator I made. It took me a few days to design the icons and code out the layout to make it work exactly how I needed it too.

Why I Made This Tool

My goal making this pricing tool application was to help people who are interested in starting a website get an idea of how much their project might cost.

About This Tool

the calculator is a simple 4 question answer though if this gets a lot of downloads and I get some donations I will be adding significantly more features and customization.

How To Use This Web Application

Select an option foreach nce your there select an option for each of the four questions that fits your websites requirements. If you don't know exactly what you're going to need please refer to the descriptions below each box.

To select an option right click on an icon. When clicked the border around your selected icons will get bigger indicating the selection.

After you've picked an option for each question scroll down towards the bottom of the page and click the "Get Estimate" to see the final price.

Are you interested in making a tool like this for your website? Let's Talk!
